scripts.dev: npm run dev:build; npm run dev:serve
scripts.dev:build: npm run clean && concurrently $npm_package_config_format "npm run html" "npm run js:dev" "npm run css:dev" "npm run assets"
scripts.dev:serve: npm run dev:watch & NODE_ENV=development concurrently $npm_package_config_serve_format "node bin/server.js" "node bin/sync.js"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently $npm_package_config_format "npm run html:watch" "npm run js:watch" "npm run css:watch" "npm run assets:watch" "npm run php"
scripts.prod: npm run prod:build && npm run prod:serve
scripts.prod:build: npm run clean && npm run html && npm run js && npm run css && npm run assets
scripts.css: npm run css:lint && cleancss --compatibility ie8 --output dist/assets/css/main.css src/css/main.css
scripts.js: npm run js:lint && uglifyjs --compress -o dist/assets/js/main.js src/js/*.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/assets/js && mkdirp dist/assets/css
